![yw0ldpc.png](http://i.imgur.com/yw0ldpc.png)

Hello my fellow kerbonauts!

Today I've invented something amazing! I call it "THE JETPACK".

Okay so now that we've got that intro out of the way here is the challenge:

**Rules:**

**- Mods:**

**You have to use the**
https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/344
[**tweakscale**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/344)
https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/344
**mod to participate in this challenge**

Other mods are allowed as long as they don't involve anti-gravity or (unrealistically) extra amounts of fuel

(I'm using the
https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/612/QuizTech%20Aero%20Pack
[Quiz tech aerodynamics pack](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/612/QuizTech%20Aero%20Pack)
https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/612/QuizTech%20Aero%20Pack
for the rcs thrusters)

-

**Other:**

- No cheating(obviously)

- Your jetpack has to contain an

***EAS-1 External Command Seat***

.

- A kerbal is required to sit in your Command Seat.

- The jetpack must be able to take off and land again.

- The starting capsule that you build the jetpack on top of must be an

***M***

***k1 Lander Can***

with an upside down

***Rockomax Brand Decoupler***

on top. Like this:

![VS4gePA.png](http://i.imgur.com/VS4gePA.png)

(If you want to launch just EVA your kerbal, let it board the command seat, decouple and take off!)

**Points system:**

**- Size(height)**

*To calculate the size of your jetpack: craftheight - 1.7*

0.5- = 4 points

0.5 - 0.8 = 3 points

0.81 - 1.2 = 2 points

1.21+ = 1 point

**- landing**

*Your jetpack must be able to land precisely*

Landing on the VAB roof = 1 point

Landing on the SPH control tower = 2 points

Landing without any landing gear and taken damage earns you an extra point!

**- speed**

*To calculate your speed points you have to take your topspeed (round it as an integer!), devide it by 5 and add 3.*

*So if your topspeed is 50 then you have 50/5+3 = 13 points.*

**- engines**

*If you have multiple engines you have to take you total points and devide them by the amount of engines you have.*

*So if you have 1 jet engine and 1 rocket engine, you have 12 total points, devided by the number of engines(2). So 6 points.*

Jet engine = 8 points per engine

R.A.P.I.E.R. engine (hybrid engines) = 6 points per engine

Rocket engine = 4 points per engine

**- control**

*To calculate your control points you have to devide 8 by the number of rcs ports you have, if you have linear rcs ports you can multiply this by 4.*

**Recap:**

So to recap, if you want to participate you have to submit the following screenshots (

red = optional

):

- A screenshot of your jetpack with the engineers report opened

(The following five screenshots have to be taken in the same flight)

- A screenshot of your jetpack at the starting point

- A screenshot of your kerbal flying over the KSC (probably screaming in terror)

- A screenshot of your jetpack landed on the VAB roof

- A screenshot of your jetpack landed on the SPH control tower

- A screenshot of your jetpack next to the startingpoint (no landing requiered
![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
)

- A screenshot of your jetpack achieving its speed record (can be done in another flight)

- A screenshot with a

*clear*

view on the amount and type of engines/rcs-ports.(can be done in multiple screenshots)

- A

craft file so other people can play with your abomination!

**My Submission:**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/TaHrX)

As you can see I've earned the following points:

Size(0.8) = 3 points

Landing(VAB&SPH) = 3 points

Speed(20/5+3) = 7 points

Engines(16/2) = 8 points

Control(8/8\*4) = 4 points

So in total I've earned 25 points
